description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $42.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with EBC. The average
  contract duration was 2.37 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $49.1M. The longest
  contract was 3.92 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $166.7M.
